solution_line_template: Jaden had a total of {initial_cars} cars + {bought_cars} cars = <<{initial_cars}+{bought_cars}={cars_after_buying}>>{cars_after_buying} cars after buying from the toy store.
His total then increased to {cars_after_buying} cars + {birthday_cars} cars = <<{cars_after_buying}+{birthday_cars}={cars_after_birthday}>>{cars_after_birthday} cars on his birthday.

Jaden then had {cars_after_birthday} cars - {given_to_sister} cars = <<{cars_after_birthday}-{given_to_sister}={cars_after_sister}>>{cars_after_sister} cars after giving {given_to_sister} to his sister.
Finally after giving his friend, Vinnie, a few cars Jaden had {cars_after_sister} cars - {given_to_vinnie} cars = <<{cars_after_sister}-{given_to_vinnie}={cars_left}>>{cars_left} cars left.
